version_description:
HandyGames proudly presents the ultimate content update for Guns’n’Glory!

Travel through the boomtowns of Nevada and once again raid settlers to earn your bandits’ living! As a little extra gift, leave the West and enter the cold areas of Alaska t

Added support for 64-bit
Removed dead link to online high scores
Improved support of high resolution iPhones
Fixed touch not working on devices with 3D Touch support
